channel.title: I have no public boolean nonWild, PLEASE HELP!
channel.description:
Ok, I am using Dragon History X as a base. and there is no "public boolean nonWild" in client.java
So, I was wondering where I would put that in Client.Java
Also, How can I add Safe Zones??

item.title: I have no public boolean nonWild, PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @llamalord318 llamalord318
item.description:
@llamalord318 wrote:

well, there is no “is wilderness” so, ill just make another one…

can i just make it using the same format?

Read full topic
item.source: I have no public boolean nonWild, PLEASE HELP!

item.title: I have no public boolean nonWild, PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @cuz cuz
item.description:
@cuz wrote:

If you’re using delta then you have public boolean isInWilderness instead.

public boolean isInWilderness = wild areas.

If you type !isInWilderness, the ! makes it so that it means you aren’t in the wild.

Read full topic
item.source: I have no public boolean nonWild, PLEASE HELP!

item.source: I have no public boolean nonWild, PLEASE HELP!

item.title: I have no public boolean nonWild, PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

public boolean nonWild() { if ((absX >= 3123 && absX <= 3191 && absY >= 3507 && absY <= 3573) || (absX >= 3073 && absX <= 3125 && absY >= 3524 && absY <= 3572) || (absX >= 3093 && absX <= 3117 && absY >= 3925 && absY <= 3946) || (absX >= 3101 && absX <= 3121 && absY >= 3683 && absY <= 3696) || (absX >= 3350 && absX <= 3363 && absY >= 3424 && absY <= 3430) || heightLevel == 1) { return false; } else { return true; } }
Put it with the rest of the booleans like public boolean isinfightcave

Read full topic
